content: I was wondering if the triage team helps with finding a reviewer? I've had a PR open for almost 2 months with no response.
I'm really familiar with the code, but if it still hasn't been reviewed in a week, ping me and I'll look at it.
Normally I reassign while going through the reports (since I am not sure if triage members have r? permissions ) but I have been busy and offline a lot in the last few months so sorry about that

since I am not sure if triage members have r? permissions

Just FYI, even non-org members have r? permissions

Eric Huss said:

I was wondering if the triage team helps with finding a reviewer? I've had a PR open for almost 2 months with no response.

I try to reassign sometimes
@Noah Lev only if they're the author of the PR
Oh, really? I thought anyone could do it...
Thanks for the help! No worries @DPC , I appreciate it.
